name: The Ocean frontier
description:
The goverment recuested the help from rapalher's company to beat the frontiers. It's robot called TOMB and a goverments robot called MKR3-Extreme-Front were sended to a platform in the middle of the ocean to defeat this frontiers. Be carefull!!

Your job is to control Rapalher's Gaming robot remotly.

This game is a topdown shooter game in wich you have to survive to ords of enemies.

YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA9DMaT1r_Rd1w8Lq30wpEg

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/EmFJ4mdQ
